addNewMovie(string).details: Adds new movie to the moviesList.

params.movieName: Name of the movie   Notes: - Need to check whether movie already exists before adding to the list

getTotalVotes(string).return: The total ratings a movie has received so far Notes:  - You need to convert movieName from string to bytes32
